Our Vision
Artist's Junction International is committed to enabling like-minded artists in towns and cities around the world become arts based, faith -integrated,"junction builders" in their communties.
A local vision can start small as simply one gathering of a handful of committed artists meeting once a month in comfortable setting such as a home, gallery, studio, church, or coffeehouse. As these groups grow, vision quite often builds toward a greater goal of community service through hosting arts conferences or creating a communtiy art center.
Contact Us!
Interested in starting an Artists' Junction in your town or city?
We'd love to hear from you and explore the possibilities!
We also have presenters available to speak at churches, special events, retreats and conferences.
